body.p:
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT,
Frankfort, Ky., Oct 2nd, 1861.
Dear Sir:
Nat Gaither jr Esq
Sir I tender to you the appointment of Secretary of State in place of Thos. B. Monroe Jr Esq resigned
